content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. Therefore, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 1.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, at several points during the negotiation, I felt discriminated or offended.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt discriminated or offended because the negotiation partner made it clear that they were only interested in getting the highest possible price, regardless of my financial situation or the fairness of the price. This attitude made me feel as though my needs and concerns were not being considered.
name: Max Müller
